Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Paresthesia 90% Abnormality of the ribs 50% Acrocyanosis 50% Arthralgia 50% Edema 50% Muscle weakness 50% Myalgia 50% EMG abnormality 7.5% Flexion contracture 7.5% Thrombophlebitis 7.5% Venous insufficiency 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease data
